title: conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Regulation of Providers of Building
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Regulation of Providers of Building
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Regulation of Providers of Building 
Works and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (Part 9) (Commencement) 
Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited regulation provider building work miscellaneous provision act 2022 (part 9) (commencement) order 2022

title: conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Regulation of Providers of Building
heading: 2. The 1st day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which Part 9
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which Part 9 
of the Regulation of Providers of Building Works and Miscellaneous 
Provisions Act 2022 shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 October, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [537] 3
text_norm: 2 1st day november 2022 appointed day part 9 regulation provider building work miscellaneous provision act 2022 shall come operation given official seal 26 october 2022 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 28th october 2022 537 3

title: conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Regulation of Providers of Building
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The main purpose of these Regulations is to implement Part 9 of the Providers 
of Building Works and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022, which amend the 
Nursing Home Support Scheme as regards the treatment of rental income from 
a principal residence. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [537]
